full_summary:
================================
**Solicitation Number**: 01R11-23-C064
**Title**: ACAN - Systec HX430 Autoclave Service Coverage and Preventative Maintenance Support Plan

**Notice Type**: Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Issuing Office**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Western Service Centre, 300 - 2010 12th Avenue, Regina, SK S4P 0M3, Canada
**Contact Information**:
* Melissa Smith, Contracting Specialist
* Phone: 306-515-4796
* Fax: 306-780-5018
* Email: [melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca)

**Background**:
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to negotiate with Microbiology International for a service contract to provide Systec HX430 Autoclave service coverage and preventative maintenance support. This notice allows other suppliers to express their interest in bidding by submitting a Statement of Capabilities.

**Requirements**:
The successful supplier will be required to provide the following services:

* Bronze Service Contract:
	+ One annual on-site preventative maintenance visit, including parts and labor, travel, and software upgrades
	+ One on-site repair visit per year, if needed, including travel and labor
* Calibration service to be performed yearly at the time of other scheduled service visits

**Evaluation Criteria**:
Suppliers must demonstrate by way of a Statement of Capabilities that they have an exclusive license and experience in steam/pressure vessels to service and maintain Systec HX430 Autoclaves on behalf of Microbiology International.

**Contract Period**:
December 15, 2022 to December 14, 2025
**Estimated Value**: $32,550.00 USD

**Date and Time for Statement of Capabilities Submission**:
November 3, 2022, 2:00 pm CST
**Instructions**:
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described above may submit a Statement of Capabilities by email to Melissa Smith at [melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca) on or before the closing date. The Statement of Capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.
